1b1: rgyags da po d+ha/ Sh+T+r-I// da po nga du byang ba kyis na chu gyi nas/ sangs rgyas dang
1b2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la ba dan
1b3: kA tsa nod k+Shib ta/ pra b+hU sa ke tu murtA ra ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te/ sa mya ka saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo
1b4: b+hA ga bA te shAkya mu ni yai/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te/ sa myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ be d+hi
1b5: ni bo d+hi ni/ sarba ta thA ga tA go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi ta d+ha re/ tsu lu
1b6: tsu lu/ sha ta rasmi sa tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shi ka te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/ sarbe bu dad gu ba b+hA se/ mi
1b7: li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiShI te/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiShI te/ na b+hasta le/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma
1b8: pra sha me/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te/
2a1: sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tiSh+Thi ti shud d+he swA hA/ mu kha man tra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta byA ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ hri da yaM/ oM tra lu tudza ya mu khe swA hA/ u pa hri da yaM/ oM badz+ra a yu/
2a2: swA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la mchod rten
2a3: de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/ des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
2a4: dang ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod par ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang mchod
2a5: pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang // tshe thung ba dang /
2a6: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas
2a7: pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du/ rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar
2a8: 'gyur ro/ / de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di las nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po
2b1: dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ / sdong po brgyan pab klags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro// /
2b2: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyun 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / @/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
2b3: rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de la mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang / cho ga ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa
2b4: gcig bzlas par bya'o/ / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te samyaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM suk+Sha me sA k+Sha me sa me sa ma ye/ shAn te dAn te a sa mA re ba a nA laM b+he/ ta ra
2b5: laM be/ ya sho ba ti/ ma hA te dzo ne rI ku le nirA bA Ne/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i 'jim pa 'am/ sngags bri ba'i tshe lan bdun du gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ oM badz+ra
2b6: a yu She swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags la/ oM badz+rod b+ha ba ye swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bu'i nad dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma gdab pa 'am/ 'bru mar byugs pa'i sngags la/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ phyag rgya 'am/ sngags
2b7: gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM d+harma d+ha tu gar b+he swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra d+ha tu gar b+he swA hA/ tho bas rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra mud ka ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/
2b8: swA hA/ tse t+ya phur bu nas phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma ra te swA hA/ 'khor lo dang // dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM b+ha ma na ye swA hA/ tsai t+ya'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sngags la/
3a1: oM su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+re ya AH/ chog de ltar byas na ci tag ni pa la pas rtse ba btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gangan bar bskus na nang
3a2: mdza' rnam pa bcwa brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ad+hiSh+ThA na hring lagra
3a3: byad+ya tA ka ra ta Da nA ma d+ha ra ni ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
3a4: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+han dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na byang chub sems dpa'i
3a5: dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi
3a6: mi'abum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/
3a7: mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su gzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo brtag
3a8: pa sems can thams cad dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang / bcom ldan 'das
3b1: ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin 'bum rib yang gsol/ bcom ldan
3b2: 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
3b3: 'das sras tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/ bdag gis sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par cig nang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med
3b4: lags snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / / de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas
3b5: de rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang //
3b6: gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te/ 'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab
3b7: pa gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus
3b8: tshong la bab na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci ga nang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags
4a1: pa thams cad deng don chen po mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gad na de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gad na de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
4a2: las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par
4a3: shes so/ / de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang / bskur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyir
4a4: dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang
4a5: gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na bskyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod do// bskyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig/
4a6: yod de zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba/ rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang
4a7: kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo / / phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// deng ni
4a8: gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/ / bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa ni yang khyod legs so// deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten
4b1: rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' bsil nas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b2: mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas pa shams pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan to// 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo //
4b3: debazhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po der zhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por gyur cing yid ches te 'khod par gyur to// de nas
4b4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar/ snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
4b5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchims gang bar bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags
4b6: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar cig nang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po log na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de
4b7: bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba lil gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/
4b8: de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa kha ra yas kha ra yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so// de bzhin
5a1: gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang / spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rdo rje gdan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
5a2: mchod rten du lung bstan to/ / lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni pan yon che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs
5a3: 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
5a4: dang bral la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo/ / kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// kha gcig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni
5a5: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ / kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob po// kha cig gis ni sa dang
5a6: po'o/ / kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o// kha gcig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o// kha gcig gis ni sa
5a7: brgyad pa'o/ / kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so// bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thobatsa
5a8: dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang / pra dog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan
5b1: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phu dung dang / bkur
5b2: ste shin du mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba la ci spros te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu
5b3: 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'bri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til
5b4: gyi gang bu snyed/ dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang
5b5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
5b6: til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur
5b7: ro/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu
5b8: 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyis gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog
6a1: dang bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgya dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro// phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin
6a2: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
6a3: 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs
6a4: ba gyi gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
6a5: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi
6a6: 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no/ / lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par 'gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de
6a7: bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am/ bgyis par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi
6a8: 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to/ / lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ sdig pa'i kun du spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba pa la gzhol ba shin du tshabs cher 'byung bar
6b1: 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i chu ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byedad rgyud dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub po// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i tshig gnyis mtshams gangs
6b2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchim byung ngo / / dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni num par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
6b3: byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na
6b4: dge ba'i rtsab ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po ring bsrel
6b5: gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgra'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro//
6b6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed pa de bzhin gshegs
6b7: pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa
6b8: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dang bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi
7a1: bar dbyin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu drad dang / sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
7a2: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba byed pa gcig gis mnar med pa thug pa la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a3: las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der klu mi srun pas
7a4: mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags me srun pa'am/ gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang /
7a5: ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta bA'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
7a6: phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams
7a7: cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol dang / rkang shu dang / ga yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi
7a8: tshugs par 'gyur zhing mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / phyogs de rab lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang
7b1: bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing me dang
7b2: chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po'i dmag gis 'jigs pa yang
7b3: mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs der srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag
7b4: kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen po yang nyin mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams
7b5: cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ / lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
7b6: gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / / yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod par byed bskor ba byed par 'gyur ro//
7b7: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan gcig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan gyi drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang /
7b8: mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ro// mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pas 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/
8a1: dngul gyi 'am/ gser gyi 'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
8a2: ro/ / 'phang dang / them skas dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro//
8a3: phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying por
8a4: mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin
8a5: gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
8a6: thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin gyi
8a7: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par cig nang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'das
8a8: ba dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
8b1: sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi rnam grangs yin no// na ma s+t+raing d+hi kA nA na sarba ta thA ga ta nAn/ oM b+hubib+hab na ba tsaT/ tsu lu tsu
8b2: lu/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ sarba ta thA ga tA d+hA tu d+ha ra/ pad mA gat+te/ dza ya ba re/ a tsa le/ s+pha ra ta thA ga ta d+harma tsakra/ pra bar te na badz+ra/ bo d+hi man Da a lang kau ra/ a lang kri te/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha
8b3: ya/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ bud d+h+ye/ pred d+h+ya/ sa ma bo d+ha ne/ saM bo d+ha ya/ tsa la tsa la/ tsa la nA dre sarba a ba ra NA ni/ sarba pA paM bi ga ta/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba sho ka bi ka te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya badz+ri Ni/ sam b+ha ba
8b4: sam b+ha gsarbatathA ga ta gu h+yaM/ d+ha ra Ni mud rbe/ bud d+he/ su bud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Ti te d+hAr+tha gar b+he swA hA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya d+hA tu mud tre swA hA/ su tra tiSh+Thi tastu be ta thA gta
8b5: a d+hiSh+Thi te hUM hUM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mudrA ni sarba ta thA ga ta d+ham d+hA tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ru d+ya / tu ru dud+ya/ tra 'um hu'u ma swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag
8b6: rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
8b7: ba la shAkya thub pa sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs
8b8: so zhes bya ba byin no/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog
9a1: gam/ / gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin
9a2: gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten
9a3: du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang pa dang / legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
9a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig
9a5: rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kyi kyis 'das kyi snying pogs pa'i nga bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs
9a6: theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / paN Ti ta bi d+hA ka ra pra b+hA ba dang / lots+tsha bcangs de ben+d+ha rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha mahA
9a7: yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
9a8: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i
9b1: grong khyer ga la ba der 'dod do/ / btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir yul rgyu zhing
9b2: gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer dbyon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra bsrung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
9b3: bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang bzhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/
9b4: sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/
9b5: slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos
9b6: bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mdag gzhag pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad
9b7: kyis bsams pa/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// mun tsata/ mun tsa ta/ mun na/ mun tsa// ma dug zhig khams kyin rnams zhi bar gyur
9b8: cig/ nir gang tsha ta/ nir gad cha ta/ nir gang chata/ na re gad tshata/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shig/ dbang po bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
10a1: skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong lnga 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /
10a2: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gang
10a3: tsha ta/ nir gad cha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / nyes pa mi 'dod la srung
10a4: bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/
10a5: su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/
10a6: mAr+Ya/ me raM/ mA r+ye/ ma ra/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi raM/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ me ri/ mu rI te/ ri ri ri ri ro ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri mi ri me ri/ mi ri/ me ri/ mi ri/ mir ti/ ta si mi raM/
10a7: nIrI ti/ mi ti/ saM sI si mI/ kA ka ra/ kA rak+Sha tA/ ka karma/ kang kA rA/ kang ka rA/ kAng kaR+Sha/ kang kA rA/ kad ka rA/ kad ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kad kA rA/ ka ka na/ kang kA rA/ kang karA/ ka ka rA/ kad ka rA/ kang ka rI tIH/
10a8: ku ri/ shang kang kar/ kang ka ri she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti re te pu sA/ ri bu ri bu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ nA dz+nyA nA nA thA/ tha ri bu/ ri bu/ nA thAg nir gad Na ta/ ri bu/ ri pu/ nir gad tsha ta/ pa ya tha/ ri pU ri b+hu/ pa lA ya
10b1: sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ zugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs
10b2: kyis ni phran ni ga tsha ta ska sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni
10b3: grub pa'o/ / gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' das// khyed la bde legs mdzad bar 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du mdzud mdzad
10b4: cing / / chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
10b5: skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten
10b6: gyur cing / / gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde
10b7: legs mdzad par 'gyur/ / dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams
10b8: ni/ / nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid
11a1: mi bder gyur pa des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/
11a2: yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis bam mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lha bcas
11a3: bde legs dang / / 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de
11a4: ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde
11a5: legs/ / nyi ma gung la'ang bde legs shog/ khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis//
11a6: sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi pan byed pa rnams// grong khyer
11a7: 'dir ni stongs gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' shig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams
11a8: mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cig/ sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du
11b1: chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste// sgo brim
11b2: ba la rkang po bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis
11b3: bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos
11b4: thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa pos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis
11b5: bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mdag bzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ sa
11b6: rat+na/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// mun tsa ku na tsa/ ma 'dug shig/ yams kyi nad zhi bar gyur cig/ ning gad tshata/ nir gad tshata/
11b7: nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shig/ dbang po dang bas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang po'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang
11b8: skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'od / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la
12a1: mngon par dang pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/ de dag kyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad cha ta/
12a2: niri gad tsha ta/ nir gad tshata/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar
12a3: 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su
12a4: mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru
12a5: mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mU rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi/ rI ti/ sI si mi/ kang ka rA/
12a6: kar ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra ka ra/ tsa/ kang kaR+Sha/ kang kA R+Sha/ kad kAR+Sha/ kang ka rA/ kad kaR+Sha/ kang kaR+Sha/ kAng ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang kA R+Sha/ kang ka R+Sha/ kang ka rA/ kad kA rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rlo tI ti/ ku ri sho/ kang ka R+Sha/ kang ka rI/ she ri ri
12a7: ri ri ri ri rI da / / phu swa/ ra phre raM phu/ ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu re pukrAn nA p+paSh+ka ri b+hu ri b+hu/ nathA thA/ ning gad tshata/ ri bra ri bu/ ning gad tshata/ ba la yA tra/ ri bu ri pra/ ba la ya tra/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can
12a8: sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa/ gshegs kyis klu phran nir gad tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi
12b1: ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam bcom
12b2: drim med mdzad cing / / thugs zhi gnod pa mi ma des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa deg// khyed la bde lags
12b3: mdzad par 'gyur/ / ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag
12b4: kun/ bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
12b5: gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don
12b6: grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams na// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par
12b7: 'gyur/ / byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
12b8: gsung ba/ / thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gri mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pha ma mdzad cing // chos kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs//
13a1: mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin bcas lha bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nas/
13a2: mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yi// byed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ khyed cag
13a3: lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur
13a4: cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams
13a5: dang / dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dir ni stong gyur cig/ semra can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' shig ldan
13a6: gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cig/ sa dang bar snang dag la gnas
13a7: pa rnams/ / skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// // khaN Ti ta sa ren
13a8: dra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shre sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/
13b1: mu ni mra ni ma hA mu ni ye swA hA// lan cig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs/
13b2: rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
13b3: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi re/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsa na riSh+ma san tse da ta a gats+tsha/ Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA ka ru Ni
13b4: kapU ra ya ha shwA na/ d+ha ra ya bud d+ha bi sh+tsa ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi tsi ra swA hA/ bton pas 'grib ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / drag dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byang stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so// rgyal po dang /
13b5: chom rkum la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// gang du bres te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
13b6: 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang
13b7: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad bzung
13b8: ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ / mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad tu yang gnod sbyin de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed pa de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do// s+yAd ya the dan
14a1: bud d+he bud d+he/ dza yod ta ra/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+hi/ ma hA saM bo d+hi/ a d+hi ba da bo d+ha ni/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud d+ha/ d+harma a ba bo d+hi ni/ sU Ta s+phuT sU Ta ni/ sarba bA ba ni/ bud
14a2: d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na swA hA/ / 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// @// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA raNI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam
14a3: par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rad na u0f7f yA ya/ oM kAM ka ni kA ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ troT ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa nitrA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma par
14a4: par ni me swA hA/ / gzungs sngags 'di'i tshig ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa
14a5: lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ / lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na
14a6: de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dgas dang / bya dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur
14a7: ro/ / yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod na sems can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la
14a8: thar bar 'gyur ro/ / sa 'am til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gar yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa 'am/ yang na men rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/
14b1: rig sngags kyang bris te mgo bo la btags na dengan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar
14b2: 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mor byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za ba'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten sor bzhin du gang gis
14b3: ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas grub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes bya ba yang
14b4: byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten 'bum byas la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas lags//
14b5: par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro// yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten
14b6: chen po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang chos ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo
14b7: zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas
14b8: mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba btab pa yang rung ste 'chi kar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi
15a1: sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byed pa lta ci spros te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur
15a2: ro/ / 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa sun
15a3: ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis// rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha/
15a4: na sA ne/ na pa sA ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ purba yo ga ma nu sma ra phaT/ ma hA ha ta ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di klags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos
15a5: nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha hri da ya nA ma d+hA raNI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya
15a6: ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi bskyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas
15a7: kyi spyod yul gyi shir ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po dka' thub
15a8: bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus dang 'khor
15b1: bzhi bsdu ba dang / rjes su gzung ba dang / kun du rjes su gzung ba dang / khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang / don thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag/
15b2: par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad tu khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// 'chad do// de khyed kyis zung la
15b3: ltar dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston cig shod cig yal par mi dong bar nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o// /
15b4: ji tsam du phongs par gyur pa rnams dang / sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskang zhing nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste/
15b5: de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
15b6: dag sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ nirma le/ sarba A kA rA aR+ShA ba ri pra pa te/ a sa maM ta sarba kun A kA re tA d+ha/ a saM ga a nA br-i te/ sa maH// da shi di sha/
15b7: ba ri pUr+Na d+hI ne/ sarba a saM ga dar shan b+hA ba te/ sarba d+harma ma bi sha ta ba ri pUr+Ne/ sarba a kA rA/ a saM ga sa ma nA taM/ sa man ta a pra ti ha ta dzetA d+hA da sha su/ daMk+ShA ba ri prA be/ an+ne/ shAn tA/ brA shAn tA/ u bA
15b8: shAn ti/ sam shAnaSh+Ta/ bi mo kA a nu praHte/ su pra te bud d+ha d+harmad+hA t+ya/ a D+yan ta su na sr-i ti/ sarba A kA rA nes sa raN/ a na ba she bla rang gti/ be pra mug te/ a saM yo ga/ ba~M za yo gan+ti ti d+ham ti/ gag
16a1: nas ma/ pra kr-i ti pa ri shud d+ha/ nIrma le/ a sa man ta/ t+tad+d+ha a nug tA/ sa pra he te pUn na ta/ a pa ran ta/ ma d+had+hA d+hA sa maM ta a nra shrI/ a na ba sheSha/ pa ri dzA brAd+ha na/ b+hA ba na/ sak+Sha kr-il
16a2: param rang ga te/ ya b+hA pa tIta thA kA/ sarba A kA rA sam pan/ sarba A kA ra ma hA/ mai trA~M ma hA ka ruN+Ta/ sarba A kA rA sa ma sa gr-i ha~M a nu prab te// lce'i bu dag 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying ba zhes bya ba'i gzus
16a3: kye chos kyi rnam grangs te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/ legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des
16a4: dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro// kha gcig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro// kha gcig ni
16a5: thos par 'gyur/ kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/ kha gcig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur/ slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chang bar 'gyur/ kun tu 'dzin pa/
16a6: mi brjed par yang 'gyur/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grub par 'gyur/ de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam
16a7: bar thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par
16a8: bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o/ / yal bar mi 'dor/ phyi bshol mi bya/ brjed par mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi/
16b1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang / mi bskrad par bstan par bgyi/ bshad par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag
16b2: par bgyi'o/ / des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang 'thun par 'gyur/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang /
16b3: phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
16b4: bka' stsal nas/ dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
16b5: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes gyi ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi ta dang / dAn shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha baban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan
16b6: la zab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha hri dA ya nA ma d+hA Ni d+harma shwad+ya ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
16b7: 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas kyis
16b8: byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa kun nas 'od kyi
17a1: khang bzangs kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa
17a2: nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs
17a3: gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la
17a4: thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas
17a5: kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun
17a6: chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos
17a7: thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyin pa
17a8: dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
17b1: rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/
17b2: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/
17b3: pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bcil nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi
17b4: ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangal dngang bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi
17b5: tshig go/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin na// tad+ya thA/ bud d+he/ su bud d+he/ ma hA bud d+he/ i
17b6: hA bud d+he/ tad tra bud d+he/ bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he/ bud d+ha ma ti/ bud d+he/ sarba bud d+ha/ a nu ma te/ sarba bud d+ha/ a nu dz+nyA na te/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha/ bud d+ha// sangs rgyas kyi yul
17b7: mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi// gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na bsgom pa'o// gzungs 'di ni sems rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/
17b8: chos thams cad kyis phyag rgya yin no// tad+ya thA/ shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ sang sho d+ha ni/ nirma le/ ma la a ba ga te/ ga ti sa mA ti tran ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa rA sa ra ba ri a sho ke/ bi sho ka/ sho ka sha
18a1: ma ni/ shan te/ u ba shan te/ pra shan te/ a bab+hA se/ sarba puN+ye ba ri ma te te/ sarba d+harma pra ti man titi/ ta ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ saM tsa la ta/ la ta la ma ta la sa ma ta la/ ri ni rin
18a2: su ri ne/ sa ma ri ni/ ri na ma te/ lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+ha re Ne/ d+ha ra d+ha re / Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+hi/ ma hA bi dza ya/ bA ti ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bud d+he/ tri pre shi/ tra si/ sarba dz+nyA pa the/ sarba dz+nyA ba ra mi te/ ma hA pra ti Sh+Tha na sa bA na ne/ sa man
18a3: a la ke bud d+he/ bi/ Shaye/ bud d+ha/ pra te maNe ta/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ ba~M sa ra bi sa ra/ khA sa ra sarba sho ka a pa ga te swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi
18a4: rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so//
18a5: rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams
18a6: shin tu sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar gyur nyams thag go/ / sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
18a7: 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal le zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis lha'i
18a8: me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabasu sor bde dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAH
18b1: seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la// sangs rgyas thams cad kya ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi// skad cig yud deras yang rnam drug g.yos// rgya mtsha
18b2: 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang / / rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi// lha dag rab tu spangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud yid mi bder sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab zos nas//
18b3: 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man d+ha 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyi// se mdodong do shal spos rnams dang // phye ma dag dngabyug pa gos rnams dang //
18b4: rgyan dang dpung brgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi brgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang // thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol
18b5: bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i
18b6: chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs
18b7: la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rtag par rgyan du yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs
18b8: kyi gzhi 'di rnams yid la byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ / pad ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo// nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par
19a1: bya'o/ / bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dag / lha da
19a2: dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
19a3: rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzI na mi tra dag dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @6// rgya ga skad du/
19a4: Ar+ya sarba bud d+ha ang ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
19a5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung chen po'i 'akram na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po
19a6: chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / na ba dang /
19a7: rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o// de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ btsam pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o// rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa
19a8: chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu
19b1: btsal bas/ skye dgu rjes su gzung ba ni deng bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
19b2: la bskul te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
19b3: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/ des na bdag cag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi
19b4: ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o/ / sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te
19b5: 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs
19b6: par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing
19b7: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / / de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba
19b8: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag tham/
20a1: cad 'di skad gsung ngo // tad+ya thA/ tsa lA tsa lA tsa le/ bi na ti/ swa sti ki/ tsakra/ a dgi ti/ pra sha man du/ sarba rog/ a na Te/ ku na Te/ ma hA kun Te/ tsa ra tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he mgau
20a2: tem ni shun ti/ he ma si si/ kor be kaur ba be/ he ku ra re kA ra re/ ku ma tI/ bi Sha sa ma Ne/ shiSh+Tha b+hi/ tsa le/ tsa le/ bi tsa le/ mA bi lam pa/ hu mu hu mu swA hA// gsang ba ba'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin
20a3: gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas de dag gis smras pa/ hU~M hU~M si si swA hA// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
20a4: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa las
20a5: bzlog par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ shre te/ shwe ta// le li li/ 'phags skyes bos kyang smras pa/ mA tang ge/ mA ta da ge/ mA tang gi ni/ shU mA shU mu/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re swA tA/
20a6: mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba li ma pe ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di
20a7: nyin de la lan re 'don ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dis sems can
20a8: thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do//
20b1: de'i lus la nang ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chus mchi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no// gang ni rgyal ba'i bu dag rig
20b2: sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o// yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba
20b3: thams cad kyis sti stang byas par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la rim gror byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di
20b4: bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang
20b5: lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
20b6: s+ho/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzI na mi tra dang / rAn shI la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya dri da sha bud d+ha ka na
20b7: nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
20b8: gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi
21a1: pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
21a2: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhi dbye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod tu med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab
21a3: kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'
21a4: d pal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi rtog gi 'od me tog pa da ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing
21a5: l egs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal
21a6: po zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog
21a7: go/ / des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul
21a8: s el rab mdzes yon tan gyi 'od me tog pad ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi
21b1: g tsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam
21b2: pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
21b3: zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma
21b4: z la bI me tog pad ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed
21b5: rtog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med
21b6: 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / tshig bton to// phyag bya'o// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i
21b7: mtshan yang gzung ngo / / yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
21b8: ba me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag kyang bya'o/
22a1: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs
22a2: pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag kyang bya'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsham mda' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i
22a3: mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag kyang bya'o// 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag kyang bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
22a4: pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / / phyag kyang bya'o// byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
22a5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/ sangs rgas
22a6: thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'on kyang sdig pa thams cad byang
22a7: par 'gyur ro/ / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun
22a8: sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob po// ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob po// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas
22b1: kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yongs su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs
22b2: su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshegs
22b3: pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yad yongs su 'dzin to// de la 'di skad ces bya te/ gang dang gang du skyes pa yi// tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad rtsa//
22b4: mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang // 'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang // 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin// gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a khe/ ma khe/ sa man ta mu khe/ sau te/
22b5: yug te/ ni drug te/ pra b+he sa ma yo ge/ tsid ta tsid te/ a khe/ mkho/ ma da ne/ bi bte/ sa man ta gra Ni/ sa d+ha ra maM/ yug te/ pra yug te/ hi laM mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsa maM/ a tsi ta/ tsa tsa/ a ra te/ bcud tshe/
22b6: ma yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/ dz+yo ti ba ti/ d+harma tsid te/ ts+ya ta bad ge/ a bi k+She be/ ra rI kA me/ skan d+ha bi ba ga te// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
22b7: kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa// bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams// de dag de la dgongs
22b8: par 'gyur/ / skye ba dag ni kun du yang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// chung zad dge ba gang yin pa// don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas
23a1: rnams ni mngon sum mthong / / gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye// dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang // mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel// thos pa thams cad
23a2: 'dzin par 'gyur/ / thos pa thams cad 'dzin mi nyams// 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams su zhig brjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur
23a3: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog/ de dag de la mngon par 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams
23a4: kyi/ / mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi// bsod nams phung po de ches mang // rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba/
23a5: rab mdzes rnyed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na med pa 'thob// sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing // mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong
23a6: nas ston la rab tu dad/ / 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// /
23a7: byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// nyin zhag bdun du tshad par ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gang gis 'dron rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i// rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po
23a8: de dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa// skye ba gang dang gar skyes par// de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// bkur sti ma
23b1: yin thob mi 'gyur/ / 'jig rten dgan grags pa 'thob// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal pa du mar ni// lha rnams sti stang byed par 'gyur// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// mtshan
23b2: rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ / mos med shes rab 'tshal mi 'gyur// g.yo dang rgyu ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang //
23b3: mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa// rtag tu de la srung bar byed// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur// sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpa' zhing gtong por ser sna
23b4: med/ / bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por// lha'i tsan dan dmar po dang // shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi// spos dang de'i kha nas 'byung // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni// tshangs pa'i
23b5: dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ / rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// rin chen sna bdun pad ma 'dab// bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan// /
23b6: mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ni pa ma spun sdug dang // skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang // 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan// bud med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud med
23b7: lus la ma chags nas/ / skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur// mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// 'dod pa zhi bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di
23b8: dag su 'dzin pa/ / de'i lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de'i sems la rnams kyang ni// dpung dang bzhon par
24a1: bcas pa yi/ / bdud kyi glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams// mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de// zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par// nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
24a2: bstan pa rnams mchod nas/ / 'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu// de dag de'i bsam mkhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las// lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas// de ni
24a3: shin du yi rangs te/ / rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom med// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// 'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par
24a4: 'gyur/ / de nas pha rol phyin pa dang // mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang // mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams// ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi zhing du 'dod/
24a5: gyur pa// der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa 'am ni bud med gang // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi// yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas
24a6: bskal par rgyun du gsung / / bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos pa nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'di dag
24a7: dpal snying po/ / sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/ 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang // gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing // thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag
24a8: shes rab che/ / rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gi/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la// shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad/
24b1: ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
24b2: bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan
24b3: bo dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA saHbud
24b4: d+ha ka nA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
24b5: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
