24b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
24b7: sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos
24b8: me pa la lag po bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
25a1: nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyilan gyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang // dge sbyong
25a2: gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa stod pa gcig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
25a3: nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no// gcig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces
25a4: gsol to/ / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
25a5: rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo // bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam
25a6: mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/
25a7: na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/ hi li hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25a8: chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu
25b1: radang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin pa'i 'chibs 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de dag zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas
25b2: brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / / nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/
25b3: ro// mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la snga ma'i mar sbyin no// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ud bal sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing ba rnams bsre sa pa'i mar
25b4: byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ / las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gtor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
25b5: don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM krA ya/ oM pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa bA tsa
25b6: ya/ sarba b+hU ta nan/ tsin da ya/ kI la ya/ ba ra bi d+h+wa nan swA hA// nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgo mnyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams
25b7: cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig/ nam mkha'i snying po gang la la
25b8: zhig de'i snying po 'di nyid lan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// gshis
26a1: ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i tshig gzhan ni nang thams cad la skud pas bcing bar
26a2: bya'o/ / 'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag la srung ngo // byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so// mtshan btab pa'i
26a3: nabar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ / gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang nad
26a4: thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya// na mo d+harmA ya// na maHsaM g+hA ya// oM ka la ka la// ki li ki li// ku lu ku lu/ ku longs
26a5: d+han nAM ku ru sarba gra ha tAM swA hA/ / nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shi ngas kyang da ltar
26a6: bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag zung shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam// kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig drug gis
26a7: mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so// dge slong dam/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
26a8: gang la la zhig nang bar langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams
26b1: thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang // thab mo dang // rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa thams cad tu skud pa dkar po gdags so// mi
26b2: nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ / dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang // sbrang rtsil btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// rA dzA nan rA dzA ma dz+ram bA ba shi ka ro ku k+Sha
26b3: men/ / 'o ma can gyi shing gis me sbar bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stod sbyin bsreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang // sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang // nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub pa
26b4: 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag la na stod sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang // rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang // bdag bkru bar 'dod
26b5: pas shu ti dang / nal dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang // rgya spos dang / gur kum dang // gla sgang dang // in dra ba run dang // byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang // 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag
26b6: gcig gis smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ / zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi
26b7: thur ma pa'i lci bar sprugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin bsreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ / gdon dang // srung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro//
26b8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang // 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang
27a1: sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+ham+b+ha ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHkra kud can d+ha ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar ga ces rgyags bud d+ha ya/ a ka Ta ka Ta/ kaHkaH/ kiT kiH/ kaNikiH/
27a2: ki Ta ba ya na maHswA hA// nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yid rangs
27a3: pa'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ zangs shing bzung ste/ kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang // dge slong ma dang // dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/
27a4: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang // bdug pa dang // spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'byor par 'gyur te// tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi nang du
27a5: lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ / yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrub na de mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te// 'di shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
27a6: skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun pa sngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar
27a7: 'gyur ro/ / ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na gza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// lhog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o// 'thab pa dang // rtsod pa dang / bcid pa thams cad las thar bar byan lan
27a8: bdun bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi
27b1: 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid la ci smos pa/
27b2: de thams cad ston to// tshe'am stobs sam/ pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad
27b3: thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag thams cad bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM grA ya/ na ma ka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga
27b4: ya/ / a ra ha te sa myaka saM bud d+hA ya// tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri si ri si ri// si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hA ma d+ha ma// d+hu ma d+hu ma d+ha ma d+hu mA ya/ na mo nA ma/ ka na ka mu na ye// ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te sa myaka
27b5: saM bud d+he swA hA/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas/
27b6: brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas
27b7: 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par
27b8: 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi bsgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing bog gam/ a ka ru'i bdug pas/
28a1: bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o// mdze dang / skrangs nad dang / mchin skran la shu dag/ 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsras te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad
28a2: sngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snga ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i
28a3: rims sos par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar par 'gyur ro// lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go// de la sogs pa'i
28a4: las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung
28a5: po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na ma kA sh+ya bA yA/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te sa myakas
28a6: bud d+hA ya/ sid d+h+yan du man tra bAd swA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
28a7: snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis snying po 'di zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la
28a8: la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na mdor na rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i las
28b1: kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// mdze dang sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas
28b2: kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te blags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ / klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
28b3: lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ / thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don
28b4: gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya b+hU/ g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA
28b5: d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ke li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ maM li mi li/ ma hA ma li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu maM/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li
28b6: tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
28b7: snying po klad pa'i nang bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ / sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o// dug spyod na mus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o//
28b8: cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis//
29a1: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// @// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn a mi tA bA d+hA raNA
29a2: man tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag
29a3: 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a me te saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kren taM ka re/ a mi ti ga ga na kI ra ti ka re sarba kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA// gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags
29a4: pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na bsgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ / lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba yang sdig pa yongs su byang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas
29a5: stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo radan tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swA hA// lus la nad byung ba dang / nang khong skams
29a6: su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
29a7: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
29a8: pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi s+thAn ta gA mi ni/ ga ga na kIr ti ka ri/ sarba kle shak+Sha yang ka ri swA hA// gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du/
29b1: bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba 'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i
29b2: rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro/ / snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tsan dre tsan dre/ su
29b3: tsan drA/ mai ti tsan dra/ tsan dra ke ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ d+harma a d+hiSh+NI te/ ki li ki li/ saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi tai swA hA// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/
29b4: zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khrir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par
29b5: 'gyur ro/ / zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ A nu ga te oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA// 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi
29b6: sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rad na shi kha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha tre sa myakas
29b7: bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ rad na dad ne rad na shi khe ne swA hA// 'chi bI tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur// 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
29b8: tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho/ @// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams/
30a1: cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'diska bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan / bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i 'ban/ byargod kyi brang ba'i la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sams dpa'as
30a2: gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs
30a3: pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
30a4: su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms
30a5: yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
30a6: yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros
30a7: rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la me tog dang / phreng ba
30a8: ngang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis sti stang du byed pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po
30b1: las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' thug pa ma togs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
30b2: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mtshungs pa med do// grangs med do// dpag
30b3: gis mi lang ngo / / brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas pa la sti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa
30b4: ngang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang /
30b5: rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang /
30b6: rjed pa dang / gsol pa dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang
30b7: ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dang bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag tu shes par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes
30b8: par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur
31a1: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bani po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos pazhi dang ldanan bdud dam bdud
31a2: kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de
31a3: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam
31a4: bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed
31a5: de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus
31a6: thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod//
31a7: narnams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus
31a8: so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
31b1: gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du
31b2: rgyu yang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin
31b3: nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ri 'am/ khung bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su
31b4: 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/
31b5: grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// a
31b6: mi tA/ ma te pra b+he/ ma hA pra b+he/ pra b+hA ba tI/ pra b+hA ba k+Shi tha b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba~M ki pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+hA bat+ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+hA ba t+ti/ pra b+ha ba t+ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das mthus
31b7: bstan du gsol/ / tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma te/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ smr-i ti/ s+thi ti/ smr-i ti/ smi ti/ smA ti/ ma hA smai ti/ ma hA smr-i ti/ ma hA smai ti/ chags pa ma
31b8: mda' gti mug bsal du gsol/ / so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ saM me/ so me/ so me/ so'u man s+ya mu ba na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/
32a1: so 'am nA s+yA mu pa na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ so'u ma na sa ma pa na ya/ so'u ma na sa mu ba na ya/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shiShi/
32a2: shi khi shi khi/ ki kiM Shi shige zhi bar gyur cig/ bgegs med par gyur cig/ pra b+hA ba ti/ ma hA ma t+ye/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+le/ rAsh+mi/ rash+mi/ rash+mi/ ra sh+tsi/ rash+mi/ ra sh+mi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag
32a3: gi mtshan kyang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan das ri chen nyi ma dag com ldan das na chen tha ma da / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'khregs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen
32a4: tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang / bcom
32a5: ldan 'das thub dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde dbyangs
32a6: dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dag med dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha'
32a7: yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das pad
32a8: ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi
32b1: khyung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das phreng ba'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das dpa' brtan
32b2: pa'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha spong dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin chen snang dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug
32b3: rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad mas zil
32b4: gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
32b5: bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sbrul 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin
32b6: chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma
32b7: dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o// tad+ya thAM/ pa ta pa ta/ dam dam/ g+ha ma g+ha ma
32b8: swA hA/ / shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang /
33a1: zhi bar bsrung du gsol// lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du
33a2: gsol/ / nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ byang phyogs logs na
33a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs legs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
33a4: gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa
33a5: de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo//
33a6: de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ bi ma le// bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma la sau b+ha be swA hA// bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma lA
33a7: ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka rI/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mu dag te/ bi ma las
33a8: mud ga te/ bi me le sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che// lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na/ nad
33b1: rnams las ni yongs su thar/ / mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang // sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas 'grol// de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur// bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za// de dag skye ba rnams su yang // rtag tu sangs
33b2: rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur/ / su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs// 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin byed pa// zhing rnams kun du rgyu ba na// dpal ldan pad ma'i snying por byung // mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// yan
33b3: ga 'od zer dra ba 'byung / / tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ kud tsA lo/ e la e la/ mug ta/ kod thA lo/ e ri ri/ ri mri ti swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33b4: chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
33b5: gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA nA shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/
33b6: Ad+ya bi sha~M Sha ba ti nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
33b7: bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'o dgun zla ra ba'i tshes nyi shu la yul phrug don can ni/ grong khyer sa na tse zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir grong khyer gnas
33b8: so zhes bya bar song ste/ dge slong de rgya yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgyad lam du byin pa dang / dge slong des par der mi lus chen po khrun du mtho sum bcu yod pa/ bzhin mtho bzhi bzhig rgyang ring ba nas
34a1: mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ de bus
34a2: mo gnyi ga'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// mi khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ 'di na gda'
34a3: 'am/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong de de bzhin no// dge slong des smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems
34a4: can rnams la nad na pa sna tshogs byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang
34a5: gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkha'i bar skabs na mi snang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang / lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni pham/ lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe 'byung po dang
34a6: yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dpal dang / ston pa dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang
34a7: nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / glad pa na ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad
34a8: la sogs pa nye bar bsgrub bo/ / 'di lta ste/ char che ba dang / than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshe dang / stobs dang
34b1: mdog dang / gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to// gtum po seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs
34b2: kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za bar nye bar gnas pas sems can rnams nod las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i
34b3: gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / khar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum bcu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la
34b4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i
34b5: phyir ro/ / de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag par rgyan du
34b6: dad par gyis shig/ lha rjed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang
34b7: lhogs shig/ nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/
34b8: bi pu la gadzi dza te bi bu la sA re/ bi pra la yo ni she/ a na la se/ a na la saM b+ha be/ a na la sa ga ga ti ga te swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ te ma he
35a1: ma ha ma ha ma swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi kran te/ a mi te bi kran taM ka re/ a mi ta ga ga na kA ri ti ka re swA hA// de bzhin
35a2: gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ga ga na sa A ka ra/ ga ga na sa~M b+ha be/ ga ga na kIr te ka re swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sams
35a3: me swA hA/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a sa ma sa me swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon pa la phyag 'tshal
35a4: lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ma na bi shud d+he/ pad me shwa re/ pad ma saM b+ha be/ king ka re/ hi ta ka ri ye swA hA// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35a5: pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ shwe ta ka ra b+he dza li nI swA hA/ dza~M b+ha na/ staM b+ha ne/ mo ha ne swA hA/ bauN Da ri kA ye swA hA/ ho me d+harme d+harmA tsin tA ye swA hA/ d+ha re bi d+ha re/ ka la bing
35a6: ka ru tA ye swA hA/ shAn te/ kIn de/ ni rbA ba N+ye swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi tu ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi la ma btsun d+hA ye swA hA// a ba lo ki te bi lo ki tA ye swA hA/ ad ny+dzan bi d+ha ma n+ye swA hA// pad ma swa re/ pad ma sa~MH be/ king ka re hi ta da ka
35a7: reye swaH/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tsan dra pra b+he/ tsan dran gar+b+he/ tsan dran tsUH/ kai ke la sa ba taM/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a nu mo di te swA hA// byang chub sems
35a8: dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya la d+he/ dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
35b1: 6u0f7f/ kan sa/ gags dak+Sha/ 959/ mangs / dam b+h+yaH// byang chub sems dpa can bang pa la byag22// am+b+haH/ u0f7fT+TA/ a9/ ma
35b2: big ta rA dza me/ ma hA bi ga ta rA dza se/ a ti bi ga ta rA dza si/ he ma ba te/ karma A ba ra Da bi shod+ha ne swA hA// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ mai tri mai tri/ me tra ma ni sa swA hA/
35b3: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he ga r+b+he gar+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ne swA hA// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ha thA/ a
35b4: k+Sha ye ru/ ak+Sha ye phu/ ak+Sha ya karma bi sho d+ha ni phu swA hA// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ kIrti tA sarba dza nai/ a b+hi kirti ta sarba dzi na~M/ badz+ra a ka re/ badz+ra saM b+ha ba
35b5: badz+ra be dA ka re swA hA/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sarba a ba ra Na biskaM bits+yai swA hA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra d+hi swA hA/ me g+ha bi s+pho Ta me swA hA/ a pa ra dzita
35b6: kA ye swA hA/ ba la dang ts+yai swA hA/ bo d+hAd dang t+yai swA hA/ karma nirba bi ta kA yai swA hA/ e ka a ra ma ye sAny+dzu/ yo gA tsA rA yai swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha a bi Sho ga tI yai swA hA/ brad+hi ba ku te ye swA hA/ sarba d+harma a b+hi Shi ga tA
35b7: yai swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She kA yai swA hA/ i ka shring gA yai swA hA/ a shring gA yai swA hA/ b+hU tA yai swA hA/ a saM b+hU ta yai swA hA/ sarba duHkho pa shwa ma N+yai swA hA/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
35b8: lo/ taHthA/ tsan dra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+ha A ka re/ pra b+hod ga te/ pra b+hod ga te/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba taM/ d+harma bi shu da d+he/ kar+m+ma bi shud d+ha ra bI ba tu mai swA hA// tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis
36a1: nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong bdun la zan sbyin no// me las me stsal
36a2: bar bya'o/ / mtshan mo mar me thogs te/ mchod rten la sti stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'bri ba dang / klag pa la brtson par bya'o// gal te yams kyi nad tshor byung na khyim nas khyim
36a3: dang grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du ga na d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang / gtor mo dang / lha bshos kyis mchod par bya'o// nang pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na de myur du nad las
36a4: thar bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
36a5: 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'bri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
36a6: ro/ / yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang / grong khyer nas
36a7: grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bkur bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam
36a8: grangs 'di lan gcig blags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/ / sus lan gnyis blags na de bu dang chud ma dang lhan gcig thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan gsum blags na de rtsa lag gi skye
36b1: bo dang ces te thar bar 'gyur ro/ / sus lan bzhi blugs na de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan lnga blags na de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur ro// yang 'jam
36b2: dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan du bkur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe brjod gang
36b3: gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam/ yi ger mi 'bri'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par mi ston tam// yul
36b4: gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra
36b5: ba de 'dra bar de mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod su
36b6: zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog nyid du dad par ma byas pa ma yin no/ / 'di ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/
36b7: lha dang dri ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam
36b8: dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de gzung nas song ngo / / 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA nA shI la dang /
37a1: bu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing shus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maNaDa la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
37a2: bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
37a3: ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
37a4: sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas//
37a5: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan
37a6: 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
37a7: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang
37a8: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
37b1: bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na de ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang /
37b2: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying
37b3: bo gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga byang zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/ oM ma hA hU~M ma hA rI ra swAhA// snying po 'di ni dbus kyi bcom ldan
37b4: 'das mchod do/ / oM hri hU~M pad ma pra ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpang phyug gi snying po'o// oM se tA rA Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o// oM A kA sha gad+hA ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'o// oM swA
37b5: tri rA ya dz+ra swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o// oM ku ru b+ha na ra ta swA hA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying nge'o// oM shrI ai rAM ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o// oM ni sA raM b+ha swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
37b6: sel ba'i snying po'o/ / oM k+Shi ti ha rA dza swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gad la la zhig gis dkyil
37b7: 'khor gyi mdun du lan gcig brjod na de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
37b8: ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
38a1: po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
38a2: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya la ba a k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
38a3: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
38a4: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
38a5: bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
38a6: nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'dzum dmyal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
38a7: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/ gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba
38a8: dang / gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags/
38b1: paspyan ras gzugs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon
38b2: la yid la zung shig dang / gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yig cung dral bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la ngas par
38b3: gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur bar sa khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
38b4: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol
38b5: bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / mnyam par gzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
38b6: khyab par gyur to/ / sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
38b7: zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa
38b8: 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems dang byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon
39a1: bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne ye swA hA// ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
39a2: 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems
39a3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur
39a4: ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan to/ / gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma
39a5: 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya bad mA b+he/ a ba mo/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi re d+hi re/ de ba tA a nu bA lA ne/ bud d+ha ud ta ra Ne/ pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba a sha ma
39a6: sha ma/ sarba sA tA nAM/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha ne na swA hA// don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phral du sdig
39a7: pa 'phrog pa byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so// 'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur
39a8: ro/ / gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
39b1: ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
39b2: da / klog pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
39b3: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams
39b4: cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar
39b5: to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
39b6: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba
39b7: theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hri ta ya/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'o// zam po zhig go som ldan 'das mnyes
39b8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
40a1: dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe byang chub
40a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam
40a3: par lta'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi sku
40a4: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
40a5: dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'ibu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des
40a6: 'di ltar rnam par lta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o// gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma
40a7: yin no/ / stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan
40a8: nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/
40b1: 'du byed med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do// mig gi khams med pa nas yid kyi khams med
40b2: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/ / ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/
40b3: shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de//
40b4: phyin ci log las shin du 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par/
40b5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal
40b6: thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga te ga te bA ra ga te/ bA ra sa~M ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
40b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la slob par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
40b8: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// gi kyi bu de de zhin te ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par
41a1: bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yid rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
41a2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
41a3: par bstod do/ / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la me tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing zhu chen
41a4: gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / dpal bsam yas lhan gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhu dag legs par bgyis
41a5: so/ / 6// rgyag du/ b+h+yan/ wAn ma/ katan ma d+hA rkA das dang / sangs rgyas som ldan 'das kyim na btu kun pa sungs sngags dang sa pams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan dan dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i sku
41a6: zhabs pad ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sal mdzad bla ma/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa/ thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba
41a7: zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjod can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma rgyas pa ltar
41a8: zhal bzhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ spa zhing gsal ba/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang
41b1: pa'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dud do/ rab tu 'dud do// bstod do// oM g+hA hU~M hU~M g+h+raM A A/ hI tI/ shi ba shi ba/ shAn ti shAn ti/ sha ma sha ma/
41b2: ma pa ya/ ta thA ga tA a nu ga ta/ swa b+ha ba/ a b+ha ga sa mud d+hA ya/ a sa ma ba la/ ma bI ra la ba la a mri ta ba la/ a ti ba lar+d+har+dz+dza g+h+na/ d+h+yed+hi/ b+hUb+h+yAM/ D+he ru b+he dra/ tIn+ti/ b+ha ga bAn ta ka/ su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn
41b3: ti ka ra/ pA ba ko lI Sha nA sha ga swA hA// de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas// yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing // nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba bo// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// grags shing
41b4: dri ba rab spangs la/ / dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo// khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan// rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po// rin chen sa bzhi chen po la// pho brang rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse// rgyal ba'i sras rnams
41b5: gnas gyur pa/ / nor bu du mo rab 'phro zhing // 'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang nas// thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la// seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs// nor bu
41b6: dbyig gi sa gzhi dang / / khri chen rab spa de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis// phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod// / thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od// nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde blag shin tu//
41b7: bkra shis tshul// 'od gsal dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas// sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can// 'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi/ dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni// mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil
41b8: 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi/ / rdo rje can dag rab bdul ba// gang yin de kun dag byas nas// dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun// legs par shin du dag byas nas// srid gsum
42a1: dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ / rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba// 'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa// bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de// cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs// de nas 'jag/
42a2: pa'i sgra skad kyis// 'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu// rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa po// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa// bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan// sdigs byed mig rtsa rgod gyur
42a3: ci / / bstan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas// legs par mchod byas smras pa ni// kye ma kye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing // bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel// rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// thub mchog rnam
42a4: kyis rab tu gsungs/ / de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyal bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang // rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing //
42a5: spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi// yon tan brgya'i spros ldan 'di// thos pa spro bar mi nus so// longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can// byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur
42a6: ba'i/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan// 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa pas// sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams// ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni// blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur// zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis
42a7: la/ / rdul med rgyan te zhi bar byed// dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms// dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste// sa steng sdig pa thams cad sel// ma smad
42a8: 'bras bu nges par sbyin/ / bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul// nyes pa byas pa sel ba yin// gzungs 'di gang gis thob 'gyur des// sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang // ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur//
42b1: sgrib pa thams cad rabazhi zhing // khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba// gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i// gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis// kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob// rig sngags
42b2: 'chang gi bdag po yang / / 'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun nas lam me ba// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang // dkyil 'khor dam pa ting med pa// 'di ni ji srid ma gsan bar// rab zhi nyon
42b3: mongs 'dul ba yi/ / rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te// rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas// gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang // legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub
42b4: gzungs gsan nas/ / thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa// 'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang // bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang // mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa// gzungs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur// gnas kyi dam pa thob
42b5: nas kyang / / thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo// gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i// bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni// tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis// nyon mongs zad par
42b6: bya ba la/ / rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog/ sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang // sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa// gang gis thos nas de spong ba// de'i mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur// sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya/
42b7: zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang // tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang /
42b8: byas pa// dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// yar gyi ngo ni tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la// cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med par yang //
43a1: nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing // shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa// nyes pa zlog pa'i gsung brjod cing // thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur// des na tshogs rnams rdzogs
43a2: pa yi/ / rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur// 'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi// yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyas pa// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig/ dkyil 'khor
43a3: dag na gnas rnams kyis/ / thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa// bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed// rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa// lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang // ri bo ti se ri rab la// gnas pa'i rig sngag+sa/
43a4: 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nad// 'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya yi ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang // khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// lha yi bdag po
43a5: rnams dang ni/ / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// nor bu'i dpung brgyan rna cha dang // rgyan rnams rab tu g.yos pa'i lus// rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni// sdig bral mnga' bdag
43a6: rgyal ba la/ / phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyi sa yi dbang phyug po// thub mchog dam pa de la ni// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos te de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba// dul ba
43a7: brtan pa dri ma sel/ / dri ma med pa skyon bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba// ston pa ston mdzad brtan
43a8: pa ste/ / sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten mgon pa snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa// ston pa po ste dri ma sel// spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba//
43b1: zas pa rnam par gnon pa brtan// brgyan po thugs rtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las grol nges par grol// 'jig rten kun mchog 'dra ba'i sa//
43b2: bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med// ngan song sel ba dpal dang ldan// dpal mdzad bzhin phan pa mdzad// mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa// khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams sbyongs// khengs pa med pa dman pa med//
43b3: mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam// snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med// 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi ba'i mdzad pa// nyon
43b4: mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/ / mnga' bdag thabs ma khyen thabs che ba// sems can kun gyi 'bra sa lags// don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/
43b5: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags// dpe byad bzang po bkod
43b6: pa yis/ / spros pa'i bdag nyid la mtshan ston// dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// mthucan yangs pas rgya che ba// bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa// brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/
43b7: dgyes pa chen po stobs po che// mthu brnyes brtan po chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis ngar ba lags// gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa// dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo gros
43b8: chen po chos 'dzin pa/ / phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyis longs spyod shin tu rgyas// bcom ldan legs bsgos
44a1: stong mdzad/ / gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan dpag med// rab tu dgyes pa longs spyod gsal// gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam
44a2: ba lags/ / blo dag blo ldan drim spangs// gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste// rgyas par longs spyod drim med// thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs pa'i nyon
44a3: mongs sel/ / dri med skyon bral longs spyod can// sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags// chos kyi rgyu ste
44a4: yon tan gnas/ / rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che// nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa// khyu mchog che spyan brdzim// rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can// shes rab thabs dang
44a5: ldan pa ste/ / 'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das// dge bar longs spyod brtan pa can// sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam thar sgro la mngon sum
44a6: pa/ / gting ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char po lags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das// spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don te tshul cheg/
44a7: shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la// sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// rigs chen 'thun par skyes pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas
44a8: kun dang mnyam/ / don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// dge sbyong sdig po spyod mdzad pa// gnod pa med par bde bar 'byir// blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshon cham lus
44b1: gsan/ / dkon pa bde ba thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan// 'jig rten thams cad dar 'dzin mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul// dpe med pa ste
44b2: dper bya ba/ / 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen
44b3: bkra shis chen po ste/ / mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste// shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten
44b4: dbang 'das spyod yul ba/ / kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rel pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan sbyar mdzad pa// spyod
44b5: pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/ / yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas// bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal
44b6: ba brnyes/ / dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs// theg pa chen po shing rta bcibs// blo chen rgal bar dka' ba yi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la
44b7: longs spyod pa/ / nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas sa'i 'bras bur gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde
44b8: 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi/ / mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha stsogs tshegs rnam kyis phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig
45a1: 6/ / 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na// gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du// skad per chen pos
45a2: yongs bkad nas/ / nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing // ha ha grags pa'i sgra rnams ste// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa// byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan/
45a3: brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom//
45a4: ldan 'das drung brjod na ni// sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang // sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// sgrib pa kun las des grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong //
45a5: shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur// de ni longs spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de yi tshe rabs thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas
45a6: sras de la/ / bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal la stsogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin
45a7: gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/ / gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de// sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang //
45a8: de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas// ring por mi thogs dgar 'gyur na// 'chad phyogs lta la ci zhig smos// de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la// gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs//
45b1: mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang bar langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang gton na ni// de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni yon tan kun gyi sdong // dge ba phun sum tshogs
45b2: sbyin pa/ / kun mkhyen bla med 'bras bu'i mchog/ bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin// 'bras bu 'byor ba ci yang rung // thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med// kun mkhyen go 'phang pob gyur nas// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur//
45b3: de ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyas sa'i 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ba 'byung //
45b4: 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang sa brjogs s+ho/ wa da pa 'i chung jugs// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mA la tan tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam
45b5: dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsar mo'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na/ byang chub
45b6: sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ / so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang
45b7: ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad
45b8: du byung ba ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug
46a1: dang / yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad
46a2: par bya'o/ / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang /
46a3: sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnam pa dang mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang /
46a4: sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su
46a5: rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtseb
46a6: nye bar bzung nas/ de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams dang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ dag pa'i yul la
46a7: 'od rnam par spro ste/ yul rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /
46a8: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
46b1: rten gyi khams su song nas/ / byang shar gyi phyogs su brgya stong gi gang gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa'i
46b2: rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro/ / der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa
46b3: rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshe grwa de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i
46b4: sras dag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa mig
46b5: mi 'dzums shing kha phye bas 'od gang na bde logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/ de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun du skyes pa
46b6: rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
46b7: stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs
46b8: te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
47a1: bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang /
47a2: gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
47a3: bya ba'i phyir/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
47a4: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang 'og dang theng ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig
47a5: rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ / 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
47a6: kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po
47a7: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par 'gro ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/ don thams cad bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa
47a8: ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag
47b1: par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
47b2: la yang yang dag par dgongs nas/ byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so// na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ oM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
47b3: nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa 'am/ se gol gtogs pa tsam 'am/ mig 'byed 'dzum tsam la rdzu 'phrul
47b4: gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te skang po nas// stong gi nam mkha'i dkyilan
47b5: nor bu rin chen rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas 'dug ste/ / gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing
47b6: gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs
